title: What 2 preceding decades from the 1900s until now were the most different from each other in terms of technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: My guess would be the Thirties and the Forties. The Great Depression stopped lots of corporations from spending much on research and development. The war started and the government started giving corporations billions for research and development. The advancements in electronics, aviation, machining, and engine development were accelerated to a staggering degree in the Forties.We should remember that during the Thirties in a barren economy we still sent our kids to college and those kids were thone ones who made those amazing developments in the Forties. It was the American commitment to education that put our economy ahead of the rest of the world.
